description: Header file defining utility functions for device bridge operations in WPEFramework plugin, including app ID retrieval, app installation checks, AMP launch, and persistent token management.

methods.name: getHostForegroupAppID
methods.description: Retrieves the ID of the foreground app by filtering running apps based on 'fireboltStatus' and 'status' flags.

methods.name: checkHostInstalledAppIsCherry
methods.description: Checks whether a specified app ID is installed and marked as a Cherry app.

methods.name: launchAMP
methods.description: Formulates and sends an AMP launch request to the application server.

methods.name: getAppToken
methods.description: Retrieves a specific token value from the persistent store for a given app.

methods.name: setAppToken
methods.description: Sets a token value in the persistent store for a specified app.

methods.name: deleteAppToken
methods.description: Removes a token from the persistent store for a specified app.
